subject: Parachutes and Parachute Jumping
Balloons
lead_paragraph: Michel Fournier, 64, has spent two decades and nearly $20 million in a quest to fly to the upper reaches of the atmosphere with a helium balloon, just so he can jump back to earth again.
snippet: Michel Fournier, 64, has spent two decades and nearly $20 million in a quest to fly to the upper reaches of the atmosphere with a helium balloon, just so he can jump back to earth again.
